text: And the children of Israel cried to the Lord; and he raised up to them a saviour, Aod the son of Gera a 3. 15 i. e. Benjamite.son of Jemeni, a man 3. 15 Or, able to use his left hand as his right. q. d. with two right hands.who used both hands alike: and the children of Israel sent gifts by his hand to Eglom king of Moab.
